Symptom/Error: Module not found: Error: Can't resolve './component'
Root Cause: Incorrect relative path or missing file extension
Fix 1: Check file path and add correct extension

Root Cause: Node.js modules not available in browser

Symptom/Error: TypeError: Cannot read property 'tap' of undefined
Root Cause: Incompatible plugin with current webpack version
Fix 1: Check plugin compatibility with webpack version

Symptom/Error: Bundle size exceeds recommended limit (244 KB)
Root Cause: No code splitting or bundle optimization
Fix 2: Implement dynamic imports for route-based splitting

Symptom/Error: Tree shaking not removing dead code
Memory heap out of space during build
Hot reload not working in development

Fix 1: Import plugin correctly: const Plugin = require('plugin').default
Fix 2: Check plugin documentation for correct usage
Fix 3: Verify plugin compatibility with webpack version

Fix 1: Check test regex pattern for file matching
Fix 3: Add proper loader options and query parameters

Symptom/Error: Multiple loaders conflict with same file type
Fix 1: Use oneOf to prevent loader conflicts

Validation Step: browser dev tools sources tab verification

Symptom/Error: DevServer proxy not forwarding API calls
Fix 1: Configure devServer.proxy with target and pathRewrite
Fix 2: Add changeOrigin: true for CORS issues

Symptom/Error: Assets not loading with correct public path
Fix 1: Set output.publicPath for correct asset URLs
Fix 3: Use webpack.DefinePlugin for runtime public path
Validation Step: browser dev tools network tab 404 errors

Fix 2: Verify exposed modules match import paths
Validation Step: browser dev tools console for federation errors

Validation Step: browser dev tools network tab asset loading

Root Cause: Missing stats file or incorrect format

Fix 1: Configure vendor cacheGroup with node_modules test
Fix 2: Set priority for vendor chunks higher than default

Symptom/Error: Chunk names are cryptic numbers instead of names
Build fails silently with no error message
Fix 1: Set stats.errors: true and stats.warnings: true
Fix 3: Configure stats.errorDetails: true for stack traces
Add custom hooks for build event logging

Fix 1: Refactor code to eliminate circular references
Fix 2: Use dynamic imports to break circular dependencies

Symptom/Error: Build performance degrades with project size
Fix 2: Use include/exclude to limit loader scope

Symptom/Error: CSS not being extracted into separate files

Fix 2: Use asset/resource with generator for custom paths
Fix 3: Add responsive image generation with responsive-loader

Symptom/Error: Source code visible in production bundle
Root Cause: Source maps or unminified code in production
Fix 1: Disable source maps in production: devtool: false

Fix 2: Configure CSP headers to allow source maps only
